Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Direct access to the Loop 101 freeway via a full diamond interchange. Located within 1/2 mile of the Scottsdale Airport.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located right of the 101 Freeway, Scottsdale Gateway I is a two-story multi-tenant office building in Scottsdale, Arizona.  The building is constructed of steel columns, beams and pre-engineered roof joist and was constructed in 1998.  The exterior glass line consists of a blue/green reflective insulated glass.  There are numerous amenities including Scottsdale Memorial North, Salt River Indian Reservation, several extended stay hotels and restaurants.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Home to the Frank Lloyd Wright designed Spire
Outdoor features include: Plaza with fountain, courtyards, lush landscaping and walkways
4:1,000 Parking available in an adjacent, secured parking structure
Private balconies on the second, third, and fourth floors, offering unparalleled views of the Valley
On-site restaurants include: Capital Grill, Maggiano’s, Original ChopShop, Buffalo Wild Wings, In-N-Out Burger, Modern Market and many others
On-site retail stores include: Nordstrom Rack, Trader Joe’s, Office Max, Club Pilates and many others

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located at the intersections of Frank Lloyd Wright Boulevard and Scottsdale Road. Within one mile of two full diamond interchanges off the Loop 101 freeway

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Two, four-story, Class A office buildings totaling ±256,157 RSF

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Central Scottsdale location with Loop 101 freeway access off of Indian Bend Road

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Two-story, ±91,581 SF Class A Office Building

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Within walking distance to over 30 restaurants.  Immediate freeway access to Loop 101, over 8 hotels and lodges within a 5 mile radius.  Prestigious downtown Scottsdale location with Scottsdale Road/ Drinkwater Road signage.  One-of-a-kind atrium ideal for corporate events.  Top building signage available – larger user.  Located on Trolley Stop.  Walking distance to Scottsdale Fashion Square and Southbridge.  Walking distance to Scottsdale Health Center and Giant Stadium.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Restaurant and coffee shop
On-site fitness center with showers and lockers
The Q conference center/tenant amenity space
Pet friendly campus with dedicated fenced in dog parks

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Ideally located in the heart of the valley, The Quad is within minutes of Downtown Scottsdale and Downtown Tempe. The unique location allows employers to attract millennial workers that prefer to live and play in these two areas. The location is also approximately three miles from both the 101 and 202 freeways.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Created to inspire community, The Quad is a place where companies, people, lifestyle and collaboration come together. A park feel promotes interaction between individuals through indoor and outdoor community spaces. Your office space is not just between your four walls at The Quad, it is the entire project.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Parking Ratio: 5.0/1,000 | Covered Parking Ratio: 2.0/1,000
On-Site Property management
10-person conference room and 50-person training/conference room
Located adjacent to Paradise Valley Mall and numerous other retail centers offering a wide variety of shops and restaurants

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located within ±2.5 miles of the SR-51 freeway and within ±15 minutes of Sky Harbor International Airport
